prompts: Create a multi-type Pokemon that can adapt to various terrains and environments.
I want a unique Pokemon design that showcases a combination of agility and strength.
Generate an image of a Pokemon with a majestic appearance and powerful wings.
Make a Pokemon that embodies both beauty and ferocity with striking colors.
Imagine a creature that blends elements of technology and nature in its design.
Design an impressive Pokemon that can transform its abilities based on its surroundings.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that inspires awe with its colorful, intricate features.

distinctive_features: A distinct headpiece with a color gradient
A tail that hints at technology
